projects.title: GrabVoice
projects.description: GrabVoice is a web-based speech-processing tool for voice recording, and editing spoken speech like podcasts, audio mixing, or voiceovers. We use our AI solution to make speech sounds as good as possible.

projects.title: Tolg Vocoder
projects.description: A classical and neural LF glottal vocoder for generative source-filter speech synthesis and modification

projects.title: Podsearch
projects.description: An AI-powered search engine for content in podcasts.
